requirements.description: This capability shall securely store the base_url for a third-party API.
This capability shall mask or omit the api_token in any responses returned from the API.

issues: Multiple behaviors combined in one requirement

requirements.description: This capability shall restrict access to the POST endpoint for credential storage to admin users only.
Service-to-service access for the GET endpoint to retrieve API credentials.

business_intent: To implement secure storage for third-party API credentials to prevent unauthorized access and exposure of sensitive information.
assumptions: Generated 2 inferred authorization test(s) based on coverage expectations. These tests assume standard authorization error handling.

api_tests.title: Happy path: Secure storage of base_url
steps: Send the request to the endpoint POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates success (201)
Validate the response structure matches expected format from the requirement
api_tests.expected_result: The base_url is securely stored and the response does not include the api_token.

api_tests.title: Negative: Invalid access for POST endpoint
steps: Send the request to the endpoint POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates an error (403)
Validate the error response structure and error message
Confirm the error message indicates unauthorized access
api_tests.expected_result: The response indicates that access is forbidden for non-admin users.

api_tests.title: Authorization: Admin-only access for POST endpoint
steps: Send the request to the endpoint POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates success (201)
Validate the response structure matches expected format from the requirement
api_tests.expected_result: The request is successful and the base_url is stored.

api_tests.title: Happy path: Masking api_token in responses
steps: Send a valid GET request to the endpoint GET /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates success (200)
Validate the response structure matches expected format from the requirement
api_tests.expected_result: The response includes base_url and client_id, but not the api_token.

api_tests.title: Negative: Attempt to access GET endpoint from frontend
steps: Send the request to the endpoint GET /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates an error (403)
Validate the error response structure and error message
Confirm the error message indicates unauthorized access from frontend
api_tests.expected_result: The response indicates that access is forbidden for frontend sessions.

api_tests.title: Authorization: Service-to-service access for GET endpoint
steps: Send the request to the endpoint GET /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify the response status code indicates success (200)
Validate the response structure matches expected format from the requirement
api_tests.expected_result: The request is successful and the response includes base_url and client_id, but not the api_token.

api_tests.title: Happy Path: This capability shall mask or omit the api_token in any responses returned from the API.
steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status

api_tests.title: Happy Path: This capability shall restrict access to the POST endpoint for credential storage to admin users onl
steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status

api_tests.title: Happy Path: Service-to-service access for the GET endpoint to retrieve API credentials.
steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status

api_tests.title: Happy path: POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials returns 201
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify response status code is 201
Verify response body does NOT contain 'api_token' field
Verify response body does NOT contain 'token' field
Verify response body does NOT contain 'secret' field
Verify response body contains expected data
api_tests.expected_result: Response status 201 with valid response body and api_token/token/secret NOT included

negative_tests.title: Negative: This capability shall securely store the base_url for a third-party API.
steps: Prepare a request with invalid or missing required fields
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify appropriate error handling is returned

negative_tests.title: Authorization: Service-to-service access for the GET endpoint to retrieve API credentials.
steps: Prepare a request without proper authentication or authorization
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify access is denied with appropriate status code

negative_tests.title: Inferred authorization test for ATA-41-REQ-003
steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status

negative_tests.title: Inferred authorization test for ATA-41-REQ-004
steps: Prepare a valid request with all required fields as specified in the requirement
Send the request to the system
Observe the response and verify it contains the expected data and status

negative_tests.title: Authorization required: GET /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials returns 403 when not authorized
steps: Authenticate as non-admin user
Send GET request to /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify response status code is 403
Verify response indicates insufficient permissions

negative_tests.title: Frontend session forbidden: POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials returns 403 for frontend session
steps: Authenticate as frontend session user
Send POST request to /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify response status code is 403
Verify response indicates access is forbidden for frontend sessions

negative_tests.title: Secret not returned: POST /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials response excludes api_token
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify response status code is 200 or 201
Verify response body does not contain 'api_token' field
Verify response body does not contain 'token' field
Verify response body does not contain 'secret' field
negative_tests.expected_result: Response does not contain api_token, token, or secret fields

negative_tests.title: Secret masked: GET /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials response masks or omits api_token
steps: Send GET request to /api/v1/integrations/thirdparty/credentials
Verify response status code is 200
If response contains 'api_token' field, verify it is masked (e.g., '***' or 'REDACTED')
If response contains 'token' field, verify it is masked or omitted
Verify no secret values are exposed in plain text
negative_tests.expected_result: Response masks or omits api_token and token fields

negative_tests.title: Log redaction: Verify logs do not contain secrets
steps: Perform operations that generate log entries
Inspect application logs
Verify logs do not contain 'api_token' in plain text
Verify logs do not contain 'token' in plain text
Verify logs do not contain 'secret' in plain text
Verify any secret values are redacted (e.g., '***' or 'REDACTED')
negative_tests.expected_result: Logs do not contain api_token, token, or secret in plain text

negative_tests.title: Encryption at rest: Verify data is encrypted in storage
steps: Store sensitive data through the application
Inspect storage layer (database, file system, etc.)
Verify stored data is encrypted
Verify encryption keys are properly managed
Verify plain text data is not accessible in storage
negative_tests.expected_result: Data is encrypted at rest and plain text is not accessible
